Text.Page:
Some of the plague mutants used to be our trained soldiers. If they decided to organize, we might not survive an attack.

Will you hunt down the {@LinkCreature:40#23#guardian aberrations} and the {@LinkCreature:40#19#mutant}, {@LinkCreature:40#19#mad}, and {@LinkCreature:40#24#crazed polykinds}? And bring back anything that will identify them to their families.

They should not have died like that, but for them it was better than living.

I'll return these tokens to their families.
We're just hoping the {@LinkCreature:40#19# polykinds} and {@LinkCreature:40#23#aberrations} don't attack before you take them out.
